item.title: W13-S2 The Limit Comparison Test and The Ratio and Root Tests
item.description: 周次: 13 日期: May 20, 2022 节次: 2 In this lecture, the Comparison Test is upgraded to the limit case. In addition, two new tests based on the comparison with respect to the geometric series is given. These are called the Ratio Test and the Root Test, respectively. Note that all the tests are designed for a series with non-negative terms. § 11.4 The
